Writing

Articles and thoughts on design, accessibility, and working in the open. Sharing ideas, learning, and new approaches.

Design Histories for DfE

I wrote a number of Design Histories while working on projects in the Department for Education. Some are for internal use only, but you can find my posts for DfE Connect in the School Account Team section.

Design Histories are essentially blog posts for projects, detailing important updates and decisions made. They proved to be extremely useful. You can read more about them in this DfE blog post.
